      • findXMLFile

        public org.w3c.dom.Document findXMLFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                        java.lang.Boolean turnOffDefferedDom)
        Returns XML DOM loaded from XML file. added by Jindra because deferred DOM was causing troubles in Differ
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the xml file
        turnOffDefferedDom - true to disable deffered version of DOM
        Returns:
        XML DOM loaded from XML file
